section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: This chapter shall apply to contracts issued or renewed by health insurers on or after January 16, 2002.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (225 day) addition, see § 5 of Continuation of Health Coverage Temporary Act of 2002 (D.C. Law 14-108, April 13, 2002, law notification 49 DCR 4056).
